title: Full Metal Jacket (1987) DVDRip XviD AC3 peaSoup
description:
Storyline

A two-segment look at the effect of the military mindset and war itself on Vietnam era Marines. The first half follows a group of recruits in boot camp under the command of the punishing Gunnery Sergeant Hartman. The second half shows one of those recruits, Joker, covering the war as a correspondent for Stars and Stripes, focusing on the Tet offensive.                                                      <a href=" http://imageshack.us/a/img163/4124/vdo7.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imageshack.us/a/img163/4124/vdo7.jpg</a>                                         <a href=" http://imageshack.us/a/img716/5906/ryl3.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imageshack.us/a/img716/5906/ryl3.jpg</a>                                         <a href=" http://imageshack.us/a/img196/4384/gvuc.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imageshack.us/a/img196/4384/gvuc.jpg</a>                                         <a href=" http://imageshack.us/a/img812/2131/whny.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imageshack.us/a/img812/2131/whny.jpg</a>                                         <a href=" http://imageshack.us/a/img842/3849/8kky.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://imageshack.us/a/img842/3849/8kky.jpg</a>                                          Format                                   : AVI
